description: A group of snakes stands above a pit, one appearing to direct or force a line of humans into it. The humans, gathered in the pit, look up with expressions of distress and fear. This presents a surreal scenario where the typical predator-prey dynamic is inverted, with anthropomorphic snakes dominating humans. The humans' fear of the pit, a common habitat for snakes, adds an ironic layer to their predicament. The situation is notable for its absurd depiction of snakes exhibiting human-like behaviors and control over people.
caption: "No! No! Not that! Not the pit!"
